author: taratorio
content: hey, in light of the non-finality tests and chain splits on fusaka-devnet-3, I was curious whether clients have a max reorg depth limit they support and how many blocks it is? Do we have some rough reasonable number to aim for?

author: mariusvanderwijden
content: Geth is reorg resistance up to 90k blocks by default. Reorgs in the last 128 blocks are very fast, everything below that is slow. And you need to at least import 90k blocks until you are resistant
